item.A:
eye
眼睛 yǎnjing eye
zuòguài to make trouble; mischief; fantastic; to go to bed with sb; to be naughty (oblique reference to taboo subject of sex)
qíguài strange; odd
guàibude no wonder
guàishì strange occurances
guàiwu monster; freak

traditional: 難怪
nánguài (it's) no wonder (that...); (it's) not surprising (that)

zìmǎn complacent; self-satisfied

xìnfú to convince

zhìfù uniform
